measurements_data.comments: 3; data from Banjul City Council, Kanifing Municipal Council, and Brikama; includes textile (1.6 percent) and other inorganic (49.8 percent) waste; sand (46.61 percent) makes up the largest component of waste and is incorporated in "other inorganic" waste
